body_html: @peterjc123 Thank you for suggestions. Looks like I will have to wait till someone release the pytorch 0.2 for Windows. I tried to copy and paste the missing functions but it didn't work as expected. Probably, I will use docker to create a virtual linux environment and use the pytorch 0.2 package for linux.

body: @peterjc123 Thank you for suggestions. Looks like I will have to wait till someone release the pytorch 0.2 for Windows. I tried to copy and paste the missing functions but it didn't work as expected.  Probably, I will use docker to create a virtual linux environment and use the pytorch 0.2 package for linux.
